name: Zucchini Rice-a-Roni
author: Marilyn Friend
instructions: Prepare box of chicken Rice-a-Roni. Add the zucchini, carrot, and onion. Mix chicken soup, sour cream, and oleo together for the topping. Add the topping to the rice mixture and bake 35 to 40 minutes at 350Â° or until veggies are tender.
